description:
Pantene ProV Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoo Moisturising Shampoo for Dry Hair 375ml

Pantene ProV Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoo has 0 silicones 0 grease to help give you lightweight smooth hair It helps to provide deep hydration from root to tip For dry hair; Infused with ProV Formula it gently cleanses to strengthen hair from the inside out

Recommended for Dry parched strands

Gives healthy looking shine smoothness to hair

0 silicones 0 grease just lightweight smooth hair

Vitamin level tested by Swiss Vitamin Institute

Selected variants

Grease due to silicone
name: Pantene Daily Moisture Renewal Nourishing Shampoo 375ml
